ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Rebreather pricing
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/2/00 9:09:06 AM US Mountain Standard Time, lomack@bck.org writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/2/00 9:09:06 AM US Mountain Standard Time,
lomack@... writes:


<< While i don't mind a
profit, i really would hate to be raping my customers, and at the same time
I don't want to undercut everyone else >>

I think you should rape some them and rape them hard!!!

Let me give you a list of warriors that should be overcharged :-)

<snicker>

Its a joke people... I happen to know the little tinkerer here asking the
question. Yes I called him little!! Even as a halfling I can put this guy in
my pocket!

Of course, Gurgel should get it at cost :))
